ValidationRule.description: Check HR Manager Address for US Location
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Location__c, "USA"), NOT( OR( HR_Manager__r.MailingCountry == "US", HR_Manager__r.MailingCountry == "USA", HR_Manager__r.MailingCountry == "United States" ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For location "USA", HR Manager's Mailing Country should be US, USA or United States
